meta.label: Override values
meta.description: Replace values in an Original dataset with values coming from an Overrides dataset

inputRoles.name: original
inputRoles.label: Original dataset
inputRoles.description: This can be the same as used in a Data Editing webapp

inputRoles.name: overrides
inputRoles.label: Overrides dataset
inputRoles.description: This can be the result of the Replay recipe on an editlog maintained by a Data Editing webapp
